ygData.subject: Re: weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe paladins can use the bbc but the executioners axe is warrior only. Some other powerful weapons I know of are the Gigantic zweihander and the Mroon
ygData.messageBody:
I believe paladins can use the bbc but the executioners axe is warrior only.
Some other powerful weapons I know of are
the Gigantic zweihander and the Mroon doll. Paladins can probably use these
too.
-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Williams <gungho77@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, April 24, 1999 4:26 PM
Subject: [eqpaladin] weapons


>From: "Brian Williams" <gungho77@...>
>
>Hail and well met! I knwo there are weapons for paladins only such as the
>fiery avenger and ghoulsbane. Can we use the weapons such as the
>Executioner's Axe and BBC also??
>
>Abrell of Cazic-Thule
>
